subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter Scott Hairston’s sacrifice fly with one out in the 11th inning drove in Jayson Werth to give Washington a 6-5 home victory over Pittsburgh.
snippet: Pinch-hitter Scott Hairston’s sacrifice fly with one out in the 11th inning drove in Jayson Werth to give Washington a 6-5 home victory over Pittsburgh.
